b.com <mailto:Felix.Roig@chalhoub.com> ; Sangeetha Abraham Sangeetha.Abraham@chalhoub.com <mailto:Sangeetha.Abraham@chalhoub.com> 
Subject: Tender award announcement : AAS - Final offer confirmation

 

Dear AA&S team , 

 

Thank you for submitting your final Proposal for air freight project . We received several compelling offers, and we genuinely appreciate the effort and time you have invested in your proposal. 

I am writing to announce that your company has been awarded the tender for Europe and far east regions that are listed in your final offer . We evaluated all proposals according to the selection criteria outlined in the tender document. Your submission matched the requirements, and we were impressed by the quality of your proposal. 

We look forward to working with your team in delivering this project. We recognize the importance of developing a strong partnership with our suppliers, and we are confident that we can cooperate in achieving a successful outcome. 

Please find attached CHALHOUB GROUP Contract template for freight collaboration , and I request your attention to review it and sign it as soon as possible. In case of any modification , kindly mention details in comments without changing format .

 

Once again, thank you for your interest in our project and for providing a compelling proposal. We are delighted to have you on board and look forward to working with you. 

Best regards, 

Sonia 

 

SONIA MAKHOUKH​​​​

MANAGER ‑ PROCUREMENT

M.C.T. FZE

DUBAI

‑

UNITED ARAB EMIRATES

Subject: Round 2 - Air Freight RFP
Importance: High

 

Dear AA&S team,

 

I hope you are well. 

Thank you for your participation in the first round of bidding for the Freight services RFP. It was a pleasure meeting with you and discussing your submitted bid in detail.

 

We would like to invite you to participate in the second round of bidding specifically for the sector(s) where your bid was competitive.

 

You have been selected to participate in the Round 2 of AIR Freight RFP to bid for Europe, US, and Far East sector(s) 

 

As mentioned in our discussion, please note the below table to understand the locations and the variance % from our target price.

The second round of bidding will officially open shortly and the deadline will be 9th July 2024 . We encourage you only to focus your efforts on the sector(s) where you have been selected to proceed.

 

Should you have any questions or require further clarification, please do not hesitate to reach out to me directly.

Dear Sonia,

 

Kindly confirm that the below paragraph needs to be deleted:

 

“Notwithstanding anything contained herein, the Parties hereby agree that  declared by  Chalhoub and/or any party associated with it. Subject: Tender award announcement : AAS - Final offer confirmation

 

Dear AA&S team , 

 

Thank you for submitting your final Proposal for air freight project . We received several compelling offers, and we genuinely appreciate the effort and time you have invested in your proposal. 

I am writing to announce that your company has been awarded the tender for Europe and far east regions that are listed in your final offer . We evaluated all proposals according to the selection criteria outlined in the tender document. Your submission matched the requirements, and we were impressed by the quality of your proposal. 

We look forward to working with your team in delivering this project. We recognize the importance of developing a strong partnership with our suppliers, and we are confident that we can cooperate in achieving a successful outcome. 

Please find attached CHALHOUB GROUP Contract template for freight collaboration , and I request your attention to review it and sign it as soon as possible. In case of any modification , kindly mention details in comments without changing format .

 

Once again, thank you for your interest in our project and for providing a compelling proposal. We are delighted to have you on board and look forward to working with you. 

Best regards, 

Sonia 

 

SONIA MAKHOUKH​​​​

MANAGER ‑ PROCUREMENT

M.C.T. FZE

DUBAI

khoukh <Sonia.Makhoukh@chalhoub.com <mailto:Sonia.Makhoukh@chalhoub.com> >; Felix Roig <Felix.Roig@chalhoub.com <mailto:Felix.Roig@chalhoub.com> >
Subject: Round 2 - Air Freight RFP
Importance: High

 

Dear AA&S team,

 

I hope you are well. 

Thank you for your participation in the first round of bidding for the Freight services RFP. It was a pleasure meeting with you and discussing your submitted bid in detail.

 

We would like to invite you to participate in the second round of bidding specifically for the sector(s) where your bid was competitive.

 

You have been selected to participate in the Round 2 of AIR Freight RFP to bid for Europe, US, and Far East sector(s) 

 

As mentioned in our discussion, please note the below table to understand the locations and the variance % from our target price.

The second round of bidding will officially open shortly and the deadline will be 9th July 2024 . We encourage you only to focus your efforts on the sector(s) where you have been selected to proceed.

 

Should you have any questions or require further clarification, please do not hesitate to reach out to me directly.

Kindly confirm that the below paragraph needs to be deleted:

 

“Notwithstanding anything contained herein, the Parties hereby agree that  declared by  Chalhoub and/or any party associated with it. Chalhoub shall indemnify and keep indemnified the Freight Forwarder from and against all claims, loss, damages, penalties, fines, etc. suffered by the Freight Forwarder or any other person to whom the Freight Forwarder is liable, because of any irregularities, incorrectness, incompleteness, misdeclaration of the particulars and the statements about the Cargo, furnished by  Chalhoub and any party associated with it, unless the Freight Forwarder has verified all this information which was provided by Chalhoub correctly, accurately, without any mistakes and in good faith, but failed i.e. the Freight Forwarder as a result of its expertise in the field, to inform Chalhoub if this information and by extension the Cargo might create any issue.”

 

Moreover, kindly confirm that you have rechecked from your side the attached Agreement and that everything agreed upon is there, and that by accepting all changes from my side, I can just simply go ahead and send it for signature.

Subject: Tender award announcement : AAS - Final offer confirmation

 

Dear AA&S team , 

 

Thank you for submitting your final Proposal for air freight project . We received several compelling offers, and we genuinely appreciate the effort and time you have invested in your proposal. 

I am writing to announce that your company has been awarded the tender for Europe and far east regions that are listed in your final offer . We evaluated all proposals according to the selection criteria outlined in the tender document. Your submission matched the requirements, and we were impressed by the quality of your proposal. 

We look forward to working with your team in delivering this project. We recognize the importance of developing a strong partnership with our suppliers, and we are confident that we can cooperate in achieving a successful outcome. 

Please find attached CHALHOUB GROUP Contract template for freight collaboration , and I request your attention to review it and sign it as soon as possible. In case of any modification , kindly mention details in comments without changing format .

 

Once again, thank you for your interest in our project and for providing a compelling proposal. We are delighted to have you on board and look forward to working with you. 

Best regards, 

Sonia 

 

SONIA MAKHOUKH​​​​

MANAGER ‑ PROCUREMENT

M.C.T. FZE

DUBAI

‑

UNITED ARAB EMIRATES

Subject: Round 2 - Air Freight RFP
Importance: High

 

Dear AA&S team,

 

I hope you are well. 

Thank you for your participation in the first round of bidding for the Freight services RFP. It was a pleasure meeting with you and discussing your submitted bid in detail.

 

We would like to invite you to participate in the second round of bidding specifically for the sector(s) where your bid was competitive.

 

You have been selected to participate in the Round 2 of AIR Freight RFP to bid for Europe, US, and Far East sector(s) 

 

As mentioned in our discussion, please note the below table to understand the locations and the variance % from our target price.

Should you have any questions or require further clarification, please do not hesitate to reach out to me directly.
